https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k9TBc0c9kLV6aa4iumDCFX6UPcS.jpg A psychiatrist makes rounds in ERs, jails, and homeless camps to tell the intimate stories behind one of the greatest social crises of our time. A personal and intense journey into the world of the seriously mentally ill. Bedlam
